data.name: JUMANJI: The Curse Returns - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The full JUMANJI: The Curse Returns, original soundtrack by award winning composer Christopher Willis.

JUMANJI: The Curse Returns brings the mysterious board game of the 1995 film to life in contemporary digital style. It’s a fun casual co-op adventure you can play with your friends and family, and now you can experience the full orchestral game soundtrack.

Christopher Willis is an award winning British composer based in LA, and we’re proud to present his original track specially composed for Jumanji: The Curse Returns.
